utils.access

Class DBRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Model
      • utils.access.DBRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<DBRecord>, JsonSerializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VersionedDBRecord

    public class DBRecord
extends Model
implements java.lang.Comparable<DBRecord>, java.lang.Cloneable

    • Field Detail

      • stream

        public MidataId stream
        the id of the stream this record belongs to. This field is null for stream records. This field is not encrypted but stored in the database

      • time

        public long time
        a rounded timestamp This field is only set for records stored in MEDIUM security streams, otherwise it is 0. This field is not encrypted but stored in the database.

      • document

        public MidataId document
        the id of the document record this record belongs to. This field is null for all records that are not part of a document This field is not encrypted but stored in the database.

      • consentAps

        public MidataId consentAps
        id of consent/owner aps this record has been found in. Only set if queried for field "consentAps"

      • createdFromAps

        public java.util.Date createdFromAps
        creation date as stored in aps

      • part

        public java.lang.String part
        a part name for records that are part of a document, This field is null for all records that are not part of a document This field is not encrypted but stored in the database

      • meta

        public org.bson.BasicBSONObject meta

      • encrypted

        public byte[] encrypted
        the encrypted meta data of this record

      • data

        public org.bson.BSONObject data
        the unencrypted record data. May be any JSON data. The contents of this field is encrypted into encryptedData field and not directly stored in the database.

      • encryptedData

        public byte[] encryptedData
        the encrypted "data" field of this record

      • encWatches

        public byte[] encWatches
        encrypted "watches" list of this record

      • watches

        public org.bson.types.BasicBSONList watches
        list of aps that need to be notified upon changes of this record

      • direct

        public boolean direct
        this field is true for records stored in medium security streams

      • id

        public java.lang.String id
        an alternative ID for this record that has the access permission set ID also encoded in the ID. This field is computed upon request and is neither stored in the database nor contained in the encrypted part

      • owner

        public MidataId owner
        the id of the owner of this record. The owner is the person the data of this record belongs to. This field is neither stored in the database nor contained in the encrypted part of the record. The owner information is derived from information of the APS this record is stored in or from the owner of the stream this record is stored in.

      • key

        public byte[] key
        The AES key that is used to encrypt/decrypt this record This field is neither stored in the database nor contained in the encrypted part of the record. This field is stored in the APS this record is stored in This field MUST be cleared by the RecordManager if the record is returned outside of the RecordManager.

      • group

        public java.lang.String group
        The group name where the record will be placed in the record tree This field is neither stored in the database nor contained in the encrypted part of the record.

      • isStream

        public boolean isStream
        Is this record a stream record? This field is neither stored in the database nor contained in the encrypted part of the record. This field is only internally used.

      • security

        public APSSecurityLevel security
        Level of security applied to this record

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly
        Is this record
